20000 NE 15th Ct.

Miami, FL 33179


Please note items that have been physically damaged, water damaged or

not sourced from our company will be rejected. Also note that

the customer must disassociate the device from their iTunes/Google account

and remove all personal locks before credit will be issued.


If the customer has an Apple device or a device with at least Android 4.3;

please instruct them to use a desktop computer to access their iCloud, Samsung,

or Google Play account and remove the device from the account registered. The

links below will assist in successfully removing the device from their personal

account even if the device will no longer power on.


For Apple/iTunes Accounts: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204074

For Android/Google Play Store: https://security.google.com/settings/security/activity


Thank you for your business!


Returns Department

Hello,


Your return was received, however during inspection we noticed the item received does not belong to us. The IMEI number associated with () do not match our records.


Please be advised that from the initial communications we have had with you, it had been established that return was authorized for IMEI # (). However, the device we received does not match that serial number.


If this was a mistake on your part, we recommend you contact the appropriate seller and request to have this item returned. In the meanwhile, please provide us with a prepaid return shipping label so we can ship this item back to you.


If you wish to return the ()bought from us Breed, we are more than happy to create another Return Authorization.


Please advise so we may resolve this issue in a timely manner.


Thank you,

Customer Service

macros.title: CS_ LG V20 Unlock Code Request

actions.value:
Hello,


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


First and foremost we would like to thank you for being a loyal customer, and please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused. We have reviewed your order and we can verify the IMEI of your device is as follows: {{ticket.ticket_field_114094135553}}

If you are able to confirm that the IMEI matches your device we ask you to take the following steps:


Unlock Pin:


First option:

1. Insert a simcard from a different network (for example if the device comes from Orange network insert a T-Mobile simcard).

2. Your LG V20 should ask for an unlock code

- for Network PIN type the NCK code

- for Service provider PIN input the SPCK code


Second option (device doesn't ask for an unlock code with an unaccepted SIM)

1. Start the device with an accepted simcard (example LG V20 was bought in Orange you need to insert an Orange card)

2. Go to the dial screen and press “2945#*model number#” (the same way you enter a phone number)

Example: the device is a P999 you need to enter “2945#*999#” or for KU990 you need to enter “2945#*990#” etc…


Third option (accepted simcard)

1. Go to dial screen and press 2945#*71001# or 2945#*20001# as if making a call

2. when a hidden window appears enter the unlock code



Please feel free to contact us if you have any additional questions or concerns.


Kind regards,

Customer Service

Hello,


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


We apologize for any inconvenience during the delivery process. The item is delayed due to an influx of parcels during this Holiday Season. We are asking for your patience regarding this matter, we kindly ask to please allow an additional 2-4 business days for shipping. If your item does not arrive in this time frame please contact us so we may assist with finding a satisfactory resolution.


Per (Carrier):


Please let us know if you have any additional questions or concerns.


Kind Regards

Customer Service

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause, but we are unable to cancel your order as it has already been processed and shipped. If you wish to receive a refund please take the unopened package to your local FedEx to have the package returned to us. The FedEx tracking number of your order is as follows: {{ticket.ticket_field_25992327}} and is currently in transit scheduled for delivery very soon. Please let us know if you have additional concerns, and have a great day.



Kind Regards

Customer Service

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Second Email - Pattern Lock

actions.value: Second Notice: Problem with your return [IMPORTANT]

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We previously sent you an email regarding your return. We have been unable to process your return as it was received with a PATTERN lock code. As per our return instructions, this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, we need to be able to unlock your device completely and we can accomplish this by either one of these options:


OPTION 1: Providing us the pattern lock code so that we may unlock the device and clear it back to factory settings


OPTION 2: Provide us a shipping label so that we can send the device back to you to unlock it and clear it without needing to provide us your personal code.

• We recommend using a carrier that can provide you a tracking number such as USPS or UPS.

• If you choose this method, you can upload the label electronically to this email.


Once this is complete, if you provide us the pattern lock, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you,

Customer Service

Hello,


Thank you for contacting customer service.


Unfortunately we are not able to cancel because it has already been shipped. The package has been shipped with FedEx tracking number: {{ticket.ticket_field_25992327}}.

Please let us know if you need any further assistance.



Thank you,

Customer service

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Second Email - Activation Lock (Amazon)

actions.value: Second Notice: Problem with your return [IMPORTANT]

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We previously sent you an email regarding your return. We have been unable to process your return as it was received with an activation lock that is preventing us from resetting or using the device. Please provide us with BOTH the full Apple ID and password in order to properly reset the device and process the return in a timely manner.


If you choose to reply back with the email address and password, please use one of these formats to ensure we can see the information: (Amazon will remove any email that contains the '@' symbol)


1. nonameatnonamedotcom (spell it out)

2. noname AT domainname . com (spacing)


Also, you can contact us at your earliest convenience to resolve your return at 1-866-603-0640 Monday through Friday from 9 a.m. until 5 p.m. Eastern Standard time.


-OR-


Please follow the steps below to remove it remotely since it has internet connectivity now. And when you are finished, please let us know so we can inspect the device again to see if it was done the right way.


>> Using your Apple ID or iCloud account, sign in to iCloud dot com.


>> Go to Find My iPhone >>All Devices (top of the screen) >> Select device >> Erase (enter your Apple ID password when required).


>> Go to “All Devices” again, >> Remove the device from the Account (item will have an “X”) VERY IMPORTANT​.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you

Customer Service

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Initial Email - Activation Lock (copy)

actions.value:
{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your phone's security features were activated due to a "hard reset" or "erase my iPhone," which put the device in activation lock. Now, the device is requesting for BOTH the full Apple ID and password in order to properly reset the device and process the return in a timely manner. Also, you can contact us at your earliest convenience to resolve your return at 1-866-603-0640 Monday through Friday from 9 a.m. until 5 p.m. Eastern Standard time.


-OR-


Please follow the steps below to remove it remotely since it has internet connectivity now. And when you are finished, please let us know so we can inspect the device again to see if it was done the right way.


>> Using your Apple ID or iCloud account, sign in to iCloud dot com.


>> Go to Find My iPhone >>All Devices (top of the screen) >> Select device >> Erase (enter your Apple ID password when required).


>> Go to “All Devices” again, >> Remove the device from the Account (item will have an “X”) VERY IMPORTANT​.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you

Customer Service

Return Merchandise Authorization Instructions



Please follow the instructions below to ensure prompt resolution of your return.


If you are returning any Cellphones, Tablets or Watches, it is extremely important to completely remove ALL accounts, ALL passcodes, and ALL personal information from the device before you return it. If you are no longer able to power on the device received, please use one of the below links to remove your personal information remotely. A simple reset of the device DOES NOT erase your information!



IMPORTANT: Any device(s) received locked with your information will be denied, returned at your expense with no refund submitted for processing.



1. Remove ALL passwords from the device

o Screen Locks

o Account locks

o Any other passwords


2. Go to the cloud or account and remove the device from your account


For APPLE: To remotely prepare your Apple device for return please visit:


https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204074

https://support.apple.com/kb/PH2702?locale=en_US


For Android: To remotely prepare your Android device for return please visit:


https://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-wipe-your-phone-or-tablet-before-selling/

https://security.google.com/settings/security/activity


3. Remove your memory card and/or SIM card



Should you require any additional assistance preparing the device for return, please feel free to give us a call at 1-866-603-0638 or contact the manufacturer directly of the device purchased.

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

We went ahead and forwarded your update to our Returns Department. They will utilize the provided information to gain access to the device.


If we need any additional information, we will contact you.


Your patience and understanding is greatly appreciated,

Customer Service

We thank you for your valuable time, and please let us know if you have additional concerns.


Respectfully,
Your Customer Service Team
